argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | xrge0tsmseq.g | |- G = ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) |
| 2 |  | xrge0tsmseq.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 3 |  | xrge0tsmseq.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_xrge0tsms2 | |- ( ( A e. V /\ F : A --> ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) -> ( G tsums F ) ~~ 1o ) |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( G tsums F ) ~~ 1o ) |
| 6 |  | #P_en1b | |- ( ( G tsums F ) ~~ 1o <-> ( G tsums F ) = { U. ( G tsums F ) } ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> ( G tsums F ) = { U. ( G tsums F ) } ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ph -> ( C e. ( G tsums F ) <-> C e. { U. ( G tsums F ) } ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( G tsums F ) e. _V |
| 10 | 9 | #P_uniex | |- U. ( G tsums F ) e. _V |
| 11 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( C = U. ( G tsums F ) -> ( C e. _V <-> U. ( G tsums F ) e. _V ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_mpbiri | |- ( C = U. ( G tsums F ) -> C e. _V ) |
| 13 |  | #P_elsncg | |- ( C e. _V -> ( C e. { U. ( G tsums F ) } <-> C = U. ( G tsums F ) ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( C = U. ( G tsums F ) -> ( C e. { U. ( G tsums F ) } <-> C = U. ( G tsums F ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_ibir | |- ( C = U. ( G tsums F ) -> C e. { U. ( G tsums F ) } ) |
| 16 |  | #P_elsni | |- ( C e. { U. ( G tsums F ) } -> C = U. ( G tsums F ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_impbii | |- ( C = U. ( G tsums F ) <-> C e. { U. ( G tsums F ) } ) |
| 18 | 8, 17 | #P_syl6bbr | |- ( ph -> ( C e. ( G tsums F ) <-> C = U. ( G tsums F ) ) ) |
